00015         mint Thread::run() {
00016                 // this method assumes no arguments to the detached function
00017                 void** argv = new void*[1];
00018                 argv[0] = maven::Selector::voidiseInt(0);
00019                 
00020 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00021                 pthread_t thread;
00022                 mint r = pthread_create(&thread, NULL, s->ptr, argv);
00023                 threads.push_back(thread);
00024                 return r;
00025 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00026                 HANDLE thread = CreateThread(NULL, 0, (LPTHREAD_START_ROUTINE) s->ptr, argv, 0, 0);
00027                 threads.push_back(thread);
00028                 return 0;
00029 #endif
00030                 return 0;
00031         }

00064         void Thread::waitAll() {
00065 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00066                 while(threads.size()) {
00067                         pthread_join(threads[0], NULL);
00068                         threads.erase(threads.begin());
00069                 }
00070 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00071                 while(threads.size()) {
00072                         WaitForSingleObject(threads[0], INFINITE);
00073                         threads.erase(threads.begin());
00074                 }
00075 #endif
00076         }
00077         
00078         mint Thread::activeThreads() {
00079                 return threads.size();
00080                 return 0;
00081         }
